title: Avoiding dopefish
content: Is there some technique for dodging dopefish in The Well of Wishes? I can just about manage to finish it on easy, but on hard there are just so many of them, and I can't get past them without being swallowed.

title: Re: Avoiding dopefish
content:
Hi, there are two ways:
1. Let the small fishes (schoolfishes) follow you, and try to make dopefish eat them instead of you, and flee as fast as you can.
2. Repeatedly hit control-key to make Keen swimming faster.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Avoiding dopefish
content:
3.) Heroes are its favourate food; disguise yourself as a villian, preferably one with inedible metal appendages.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Avoiding dopefish
content: yep. lol. good-times. also, im back. its been, what, half a year. anyways, before you meet the dopefish guarding the gate, theres a small underhang below the gate. you can swim there for awhile and wait for a moment, then just swim directly at it, pressing against the wall and that should work. has for me every time [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]

title: Re: Avoiding dopefish
content:
D90, we don't want advice from you; this whole topic is about avoiding you.

No... stay away... noooo!A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society
